title: Software Engineer
description: Design and develop scalable software solutions. Write clean, maintainable code and participate in code reviews. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products.

title: Software Developer
description: Develop robust software applications using modern programming languages. Implement features, fix bugs, and optimize performance. Work in an agile environment with continuous integration.

title: Full-Stack Developer
description: Build end-to-end web applications from frontend to backend. Handle both client-side and server-side development. Create responsive UIs and scalable APIs.

title: Full-Stack Engineer
description: Develop complete web applications across the entire technology stack. Design databases, build APIs, and create user interfaces. Ensure seamless integration between frontend and backend.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Create responsive and interactive user interfaces. Implement modern UI/UX designs using React and TypeScript. Optimize frontend performance and ensure cross-browser compatibility.

title: Frontend Engineer
description: Build pixel-perfect user interfaces. Develop reusable components and maintain design systems. Optimize performance and implement accessibility standards.

title: Backend Developer
description: Build and maintain server-side applications and APIs. Design database schemas and optimize queries. Ensure system scalability and reliability.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Develop RESTful APIs and microservices. Work with databases, caching, and cloud infrastructure. Implement authentication and authorization systems.

title: MERN Stack Developer
description: Develop full-stack applications using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js. Build RESTful APIs and dynamic user interfaces. Implement authentication and data management.

title: MERN Developer
description: Create web applications using the MERN technology stack. Design database schemas, build APIs, and develop interactive frontends. Deploy applications to cloud platforms.

title: React Developer
description: Build modern user interfaces using React. Develop reusable components and manage application state. Optimize React applications for performance.

title: React Engineer
description: Develop complex React applications. Implement routing, state management, and API integration. Build component libraries and maintain code quality.
requirements: React;TypeScript;Next.js;Context API;React Router;testing;performance optimization;React best practices

title: Node.js Developer
description: Build server-side applications using Node.js. Develop RESTful APIs and microservices. Work with databases and implement real-time features.

title: Node.js Engineer
description: Develop scalable backend services with Node.js. Design APIs, implement authentication, and optimize performance. Work with cloud services and containerization.

title: Web Developer
description: Build responsive websites and web applications. Ensure cross-browser compatibility and implement SEO best practices. Create engaging user experiences.

title: Web Engineer
description: Develop modern web applications. Implement responsive designs and optimize for performance. Integrate third-party APIs and ensure accessibility.

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Develop ML models for production systems. Build recommendation systems, predictive models, and automated decision-making systems. Optimize model performance and deployment.

title: ML Engineer
description: Design and implement machine learning solutions. Train models, evaluate performance, and deploy to production. Work with large datasets and optimize inference.
requirements: Python;machine learning;deep learning;ML frameworks;model training;feature engineering;MLOps;production ML

title: AI Engineer
description: Develop AI-powered solutions and applications. Work with large language models, generative AI, and AI agents. Build intelligent systems that solve complex problems.

title: GenAI Engineer
description: Build generative AI applications using large language models. Fine-tune models, implement RAG systems, and optimize inference. Create AI-powered products and features.

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyze complex datasets and build predictive models. Create data visualizations and communicate insights to stakeholders. Develop statistical models and machine learning solutions.

title: Data Scientist
description: Extract insights from data and build predictive models. Perform exploratory data analysis and create dashboards. Work with stakeholders to solve business problems using data.
requirements: Python;SQL;Tableau;statistical analysis;machine learning;data visualization;business intelligence;data storytelling

title: Data Engineer
description: Build and maintain data pipelines and ETL processes. Design data warehouses and ensure data quality. Optimize data processing and storage systems.

title: Data Engineer
description: Develop scalable data infrastructure. Build ETL pipelines, manage data lakes, and ensure data reliability. Work with cloud data platforms and streaming data.

title: MLOps Engineer
description: Productionize machine learning models. Implement CI/CD pipelines for ML, monitor model performance, and manage model versions. Ensure reliable ML operations.
requirements: Docker;Kubernetes;MLflow;CI/CD;model deployment;ML monitoring;ML infrastructure;DevOps for ML

title: MLOps Engineer
description: Build and maintain ML infrastructure. Automate model training and deployment pipelines. Implement monitoring and alerting for ML systems.

title: NLP Engineer
description: Develop natural language processing solutions. Build chatbots, text analysis systems, and language understanding models. Work with transformers and language models.

title: NLP Engineer
description: Build NLP applications and models. Implement text classification, named entity recognition, and language generation. Fine-tune language models for specific tasks.

title: Computer Vision Engineer
description: Develop computer vision models for image and video analysis. Implement object detection, image classification, and video processing systems.

title: Computer Vision Engineer
description: Build computer vision applications. Develop models for object detection, facial recognition, and image segmentation. Optimize models for real-time inference.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Implement DevOps practices and automate software delivery. Manage CI/CD pipelines, containerization, and infrastructure. Ensure reliable deployments and system monitoring.

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Automate infrastructure and deployment processes. Manage cloud resources, implement monitoring, and ensure high availability. Build scalable and reliable systems.

title: Cloud Engineer
description: Design and manage cloud infrastructure. Optimize cloud costs and ensure high availability. Implement cloud security and compliance.

title: Cloud Engineer
description: Build and maintain cloud infrastructure. Deploy applications to cloud platforms and manage cloud resources. Implement auto-scaling and load balancing.

title: Cybersecurity Engineer
description: Design and implement security solutions. Conduct security assessments, implement security controls, and respond to security incidents. Protect systems and data from threats.
requirements: security tools;penetration testing;vulnerability assessment;security frameworks;incident response;security architecture;threat analysis

title: Cybersecurity Engineer
description: Secure IT infrastructure and applications. Implement security policies, conduct risk assessments, and manage security tools. Ensure compliance with security standards.
requirements: cybersecurity;security tools;risk assessment;security policies;compliance;threat detection;security monitoring;security architecture

title: Security Analyst
description: Monitor security systems and analyze security events. Investigate security incidents and respond to threats. Create security reports and recommendations.
requirements: SIEM tools;security monitoring;incident response;threat analysis;security analysis;log analysis;security tools;threat intelligence

title: Security Analyst
description: Analyze security logs and investigate potential threats. Monitor security systems and respond to security alerts. Document security incidents and provide recommendations.
requirements: security analysis;SIEM;log analysis;threat detection;incident response;security monitoring;vulnerability assessment;security reporting

title: SOC Analyst
description: Monitor security operations center systems. Analyze security alerts and investigate potential security incidents. Escalate critical threats and maintain security dashboards.
requirements: SOC operations;SIEM;security monitoring;incident response;threat analysis;security tools;alert triage;security operations

title: SOC Analyst
description: Work in a security operations center monitoring security systems. Analyze network traffic, investigate alerts, and respond to security incidents. Maintain security documentation.
requirements: SOC;security monitoring;network security;incident response;SIEM tools;threat analysis;security operations;alert management

title: Penetration Tester
description: Conduct security assessments and penetration testing. Identify vulnerabilities in systems and applications. Provide remediation recommendations and security reports.
requirements: penetration testing;OWASP;security tools;vulnerability assessment;ethical hacking;security testing;exploitation;security reporting

title: Ethical Hacker
description: Perform authorized security testing and vulnerability assessments. Simulate attacks to identify security weaknesses. Document findings and provide security recommendations.
requirements: ethical hacking;penetration testing;vulnerability assessment;security tools;exploitation techniques;security testing;reporting;security assessment

title: Vulnerability Analyst
description: Identify and assess security vulnerabilities in systems and applications. Prioritize vulnerabilities based on risk and provide remediation guidance. Track vulnerability remediation.
requirements: vulnerability assessment;security scanning;risk assessment;vulnerability management;security tools;CVSS;remediation;security analysis

title: Vulnerability Analyst
description: Conduct vulnerability scans and assessments. Analyze scan results and prioritize vulnerabilities. Work with teams to remediate security issues and track progress.
requirements: vulnerability scanning;security assessment;risk analysis;vulnerability management;security tools;patch management;remediation tracking;security reporting

title: Security Consultant
description: Provide security consulting services to clients. Assess security posture, develop security strategies, and implement security solutions. Guide organizations on security best practices.
requirements: security consulting;security assessment;risk management;security strategy;compliance;security architecture;client engagement;security advisory

title: Security Consultant
description: Advise organizations on cybersecurity strategies and solutions. Conduct security assessments and develop security roadmaps. Help clients improve their security posture.
requirements: security consulting;risk assessment;security strategy;compliance;security architecture;client consulting;security advisory;security planning
